snippet.title: KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION - OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
The KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION is now open...entry is free. 
Download for PlayStation 5, PC and Mac at https://kida-mnesia.com

Radiohead and Epic Games Publishing are proud to present KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION: an upside-down digital/analogue universe created from original artwork by Thom Yorke and Stanley Donwood and sound design by Nigel Godrich to commemorate 21 years of Radiohead’s Kid A and Amnesiac albums. 

For PC & Mac: https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/kid-a-mnesia-exhibition
For PlayStation 5: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10003085/

Triple album ‘KID A MNESIA’ is out now via XL Recordings: https://radiohead.ffm.to/kid-a-mnesia
